title: Investigating the impact of credit channels, energy production and oil revenues on agricultural development in sub-Saharan Africa
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Charles O. Manasseh, Chine Sp Logan, Ogochukwu C. Okanya, Kenechukwu K. Ede, Ebelechukwu L. Okiche, Sylvester Ilo, Jonathan E. Ogbuabor, Ifeoma C. Nwakoby
